评论详情: I recently purchased this T-shirt, and I love it. The sizing of this shirt is spot on. While it is true to size, I opted to buy one size up because I prefer my tees to have a baggier fit. It feels great against the skin and is perfect for all-day comfort. I also like to wear it to the gym. I highly recommend it to anyone looking for a cool, vintage-inspired tee!
